channel.title: Software-Engineering on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation
channel.description: Recent content in Software-Engineering on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation

item.title: Signals: Week 05, 2026
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The professionalization of the AI era: Moving from vibe coding to agentic engineering, and why business is a design job.

item.title: Moats in the Era of Vibe Coding
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: In a world where AI tools let almost anyone quickly prototype and ship software, traditional moats are eroding. This article explores 8 durable moats for the AI era and maps them to Hamilton Helmer’s 7 Powers.

item.title: The Evolution of Python Environment Management
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A practitioner’s walkthrough of why Python suffers from dependency hell, how tools like virtualenv, pyenv, Poetry, and UV emerged to solve it, and what this evolution tells us about modern software ecosystems.
